name: Ekko
description:
EKKO

Use fragments of your former self to solve the puzzles and escape the loop!

This game is made for the LDJam #47 by a small team, of artists and programmers, over a few days.

Credits:

  • Zpanzer (Art)
  • Thorlegs (Art)
  • Santino (Art)
  • PierreNS (Programming)
  • BonBonCul (Programming)
  • dipth (Programming)
